import React from 'react' import '../resources/css/Card.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { Action } from '@reduxjs/toolkit' function ItemComponent({props}) { let counter = useSelector((state) => state.counter) let dispatch=useDispatch() let AddToCart = () => { dispatch(actions.AddToCart()) } return (

{props.name}

Price: {props.price}$

In store: {props.avalible}

About:

{props.characteristics}

Counter: {counter}

) } export default ItemComponent
